page.title: 11Unst Football-in general.
page.content: The Unst League started in 1922 with teams from Baltasound, Haroldswick and Uyeasound. Each team had a 'B' team so there were 6 teams in the League. As people left the island football fell away a bit but in the 1950's with the RAF camp being built teams from there began to compete.There have also been works teams such as a team from the firm Knockbreda who were up building new council houses in the mid-70's. A combined team from Unst also plays in inter-island competitions such as the Parish Cup, as well as playing as RAF 'A'and 'B',Northern Rangers(Harolds- wick) and Baltasound United for the Spence Cup which is only for Unst teams. Generally Northern Rangers and the RAF have been the most successful.
